column3:
“I was never going to write a review on this but something interesting happened to me that I have to mention. I live 100 miles from the Mexican border and this was the only weed I knew. Layers of compressed shitty bud filled with seed.I grew up on it. 
It's been a long time since I've smoked me some Reggie so about a week ago while I was low on cash I decided to buy and ounce. ( lol 60$) 
This Reggie reeked of skunky ...”

“Mexican strains have bad reputation because of the brick method which causes degradation on the quality and also because it contains seeds but yesterday I went to visit a friend in his restaurant in Puerto Vallarta, Mexico. I was telling him how good Marijuana was in Czech Republic and how it was much better than Mexican Brick Weed.

He told me he had some really good Mexican Land Race Sativa grown in the mountains o...”

“In reference to an earlier post, there are many wonderful varieties of Mexican sativa. For those of you who started on Mexican, the buzz is very unique. Mostly in the face and very very euphoric. Not all of it has a bad taste. It just depends on the person you know and how close the connection is to the border. Most of the Mexican that I have gotten has been compressed, but sometimes you can get some fat round nugs a...”

“Almost all Mexican Sativa strains grow in the coast of Mexico, each landrace have different flavors, smell, color and effects. The best and most famous California Sativa Hybrids and mix Sativas have Mexican Sativa origin, since 1960's us residents have taken seeds to us to grow and breed mostly in NC, the most famous one Golden Acapulco, but believe me golden Acapulco is not the best Mexican Sativa around. Most of Me...”

“Good old classic Mexican Reggie weed. This stuff is never horrible but it's also never great. It's dry and full of seeds but .5-.7 of this will have you feeling pretty good. Can't be the general price on it either ($5 a gram $75 an ounce where I live). Good for saving money”

“I have smoke some of the real good shit in California and since i moved back down to mexico i have smoke nothing but Mexa thats how We called it here, i got amazed when i found out the incredible Mexa is grown in the state of Colima, We have a very active volvano and some of the people that libes around It grows weed and most of the time this weed is purple and is not kush is not skunk or some of that medical stuff b...”

“I tried Nirvanas El Dorado version of a Mexican Sativa backcross and it was one of the best strains I have ever seen. The high is the perfect mix of relaxing and energetic with extreme heavenly euphoria and absolutely no paranoia whatsoever. Amazing visual crispness and clarity that makes you just want to stare at your shiny cell phone app or go out and explore nature. Good social high. This is one of the best medica...”

“Mexican weed strain is mass produced outside mostly. A lot of plants become pollinated and become hermaphrodites which is the reason Mexican swag has seeds in it. That effects the thc levels and/or the quality of the flower. If you can get good female plants and produce some nice Mexican buds the next problem is getting it across the border. Usually, the weed is bricked then wrapped then sprayed with something to mas...”

“THIS IS NOT GOOD WEED UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCE SERIOUSLY BUT BUT BUT, if you want weed for situations that involve you not being completely gone or even  moderately gone, this is your weed. I would rather this shit be legal and at gas stations so i could smoke a pack on the way to wherever or when i need to have a comfy moment to go do stuff, or pretty much any moment i would ever think of ever smoking a cigarette. I ne...”

“Very good indica dominant strain, very good for pain and not too slugish, keeps you active while you get your theraputic going on, i got bit by a bee today and smoked some shwag" mexican 3 joints and i got medicated pretty well
column4: it almost paralles pain in body . Great God gifted strain”"

column3: “Unfortunately the only Mexican that's really around anymore is the disgusting brick weed that is grown  in mass quantities in Mexico using bad growing techniques. However I would bet if grown well it would be quite similar to landrace Acapulco Gold.”

“Mexican weed strain is mass produced outside mostly. A lot of plants become pollinated and become hermaphrodites which is the reason Mexican swag has seeds in it. That effects the thc levels and/or the quality of the flower. If you can get good female plants and produce some nice Mexican buds the next problem is getting it across the border. Usually, the weed is bricked then wrapped then sprayed with something to mas...”

“can be good or bad smoke. I'm very close to the border of Mexico so it is easy and cheap to find, $40 an ounce, $350 a pound. always very bricked bit some batches are very lime green with few seeds and will do the trick pretty good. I won't buy this weed but it is worth trying a grow if u find some nice seeds in a good batch.”
“Mexican brick weed brings a 10 minutes cerebral burst of energy followed by a headache. Terrible earthy tar flavor. dry as dust.”
“I've got good and bad in it, mostly more bad than good but you can get a pretty good buzz for low price if you can find the good”
“This strain helps me take huge shits”

“seeds but if you don't want to spend that much its an alright high sativa effects for about an hour but if you have a high tolerance and you smoke enough it wears you out in a haze to a nice sleep it taste like wood and tar very earthy weed last pretty long for a quarter”
“This strain helps me take huge shits”

“I really like my Oaxacan. A friend gifted me with some he grew. He put the work into her and it shows. Smooth smoke, nice buzz, nothing heavy or trippy yet it just. hits the spot for me. I even get a pleasant sleep from it. I have Oaxacan/Early Iranian seeds coming from Oregon Green Seed, I can't wait to see what I get from them.”

“Trying to bring up the curve.  We all know about the garbage that comes in bricks and has God knows what in it or on it.  However, real Mex is not awful and definitely beats some of these elegant" strains for it's effect.  I think it's really a 4 of 5 but just hate to see it get bashed because of it's typical appearance and smoke quality due to the trade.”"
“Not the strongest, but a fairly good high; however,the exact strain" usually depends on how deep in Mexico you are. Like most people have said
column4: indigenous marijuana plants in Latin America were "sativa"
column6: yet there is a decent body high. Now
column7: while in Mexico and in the States
column8: I've had some straight up Mexican Reggie. But once in Zacatecas
column9: after a while of asking around and eve...”"

column3:
“Gasoline tasting, tar producing, babbage ass shit...  But I likes it. 

Heady
Sleepy
Hungry
Relaxing”

“Not a big fan of this strain. Gets me paranoid and the high last less than 1 hour, gives you  the munchies HARRD and it also gives you headaches. But if taken enough you'll get a good body high, I still consider it one of the worst, it is abundant with seeds, I suppose if someone experienced grew it in a green house then it wouldn't be that bad.

All they know about growing weed down here is that you plant the seed...”
“While its true that the most stoned ive ever been was from shwag, its definitely not worth the other few hundred bags of crap you'll get trying to find it.”

“Not a big fan of this strain. Gets me paranoid and the high last less than 1 hour, gives you  the munchies HARRD and it also gives you headaches. But if taken enough you'll get a good body high, I still consider it one of the worst, it is abundant with seeds, I suppose if someone experienced grew it in a green house then it wouldn't be that bad.

All they know about growing weed down here is that you plant the seed...”

“this strain has a bad rep and is a weird strain because some batches are good and some are straight shit. my dealer had this and i was skeptical because i have gotten this before and it tasted like smoking a cigarette but he said it was more better and it was smooth hits and taste good and a creeper high which to me are more intense because it on and off hits u outta the blue”
“This is the worst bud i ever smoked. I can get 10g for 25 bucks because it always has seeds and stems smells so plain taste like garbage. I refuse to smoke it anymore.”
“Fumo mexicana como PANCHO VILLA”

“After living in San Francisco and having a medical marijuana card, I unfortunately moved to a state without MM, then I moved back out West and I bought some Mexican at Kind Leaf Cannabis in Pendleton Oregon, it was called Oaxacan.  Since I hadn't been an everyday smoker in awhile I wanted a strain with a low THC content.  I was amazed at the euphoria I got from this strain, it's great for daytime use as I got things ...”
“It's almost impossible to rate such a wide spectrum, it's all about where and when you get it. It's always pretty cheap but not always good.”
“All depends on where and how you get it but if it's full of seeds it's usually not very good but a sensimilia flower of this bud will compete with any loud”
“something we are probably all raised on but leave behind as soon as we try real weed. who likes paying for seeds, stems and a quick burn honestly?”

“I live in a non legal area, got this for 10 a G, (Bought 4 G) and I smoked out with a first timer, fairly strong buzz for me smoking 1 gram, my friend ad it a bit heavier, but it still didn't get us blazed r anything, so in my opinion, it's nice, cheap weed.”
“Not a bad buzz if you can find this sativa fresh and not bricked. Heady high with a spicy/earthy taste.”

“I ain't the sort to review weed, but I reckon we ought to clear up some misconceptions. The brick weed from Mexico is lousy with seeds, but this isn't a bad thing.

You take some of those seeds and plant em, weed out the males, spend a good long while caring for them, and you'll be suprised to find that it actually pretty good!”

“This bud is good, it has a good high. it never lasts more than 3 hours for me, however. where i am, it costs about $10 for 5 grams, $20 for about 10 grams. it saves a lot of money. you dont get as high as with other types of bud, but you feel pretty good.”
“sucks! how do people enjoy this? just curious ...but if u can't afford anything else then smoke it. but I can never prefer this untaken care of crap of a buzz.”
“can be a good high if enough is smoked , not preferred but gets the job done if it is grown properly.”
“Perfect high to build a wall to, so you can make America great again”
“Very sleepy effect but don't like the brick”
“Like many others, smoked the cheap shit and then moved my way up to others. This was what started it all. Nice, mellow buzz for starters.”

“not the best I've had but solid. euphoric, head high although, not a very functional high. just bought some down in Mexico, lots of seeds and stems, for sure not the strongest. would really like to see how this strain is when grown under perfect conditions.”
“reggie.”
“Great daytime strain. Felt very productive and euphoric!”
“Average, cheap strain to smoke when that's all you can afford. It made me extremely sleepy after a while and it also comes with a hell of a dry mouth and dry eyes.”
“For me personally its good i get a good body relaxation,and a heady high also.”
“Tt”
“Mexican is definitely regs”
“I think that it's a thinking strain. tgus made me question what happened after death for like 2 hours.  good shit.”

“Out of all the Indica-Sativa hyrids the Cartels have been pushing down here in Texas I finally stumbled apon some pretty decent quality mj that is Lime green and has rock hard buds but very light. The weed is a very good smoke and got about half a gram for 5$ but if you were to buy a pound tgey cost like 350 down here in Texas, so those dealers should be smart to make oils but its too povertised in tge southern regio...”
“average but reasonable , I wonder what strain this is”
“it was a nice strain with a heady high and body relaxation.”
“Dirt weed”

“Medium high that gives super dry mouth. Makes a nice hash though. Not quite strong enough for the daily smoker. Better for the day time as of a nighttime this strain gave me headaches and dizziness.”
“taste like ass better if u take leafs from the gutter”

“I struggled between two and three stars, but those of us who remember landlines most certainly remember this vast variety of landraces.   I smoked for 5 years before I knew there was anything else.   It's hard to qualify Schwag because it's not really one strain, I've smoked a quarter and not gotten high, but I've also been blitzed off a quarter gram.  Mexico is a big country, with a history of cannabis cultivation s...”
“It's sound like it's good but average”

“If you don’t like Professional Mexican Weed
You hate Guava and Lasagna 
As George Carlin once said”
“good when you low on cash”

“If you can find some mid to upper mid grade of this and mix it with your favorite high end. Durban, Mobb Boss, Kushes etc. it makes a nice Salad. Also to make your stash last and wallet happy. Alone, it will do in a pinch or give you a seed headache if you don't groom well.”
“I live in Mexico and its a great weed to smoke, i smoke it almost everyday, i recommend this shit!”
“very great and a great high yielder depending on the oheno selected”
“it's straight dank weed”

“I can't tell if it's the 15 hours of travel on 3 hours of sleep or the strain, but this mota weighs heavy on the eyelids. We went through quite an adventure to obtain la mota, involving a barrio, una farmacia and a dude in an SUV that smelled like blunts. This stuff looks like shit and is full of seeds and stems, mostly brownish yellow rather than green, but it smokes up just fine. Even better when rolled up spliffst...”
“ugf”
